official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit student financial aid from covering the cost of room and board for students who are incarcerated.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit student financial aid from covering the cost of room and board for students who are incarcerated.
